title: Bank of France keeps forecasts for third-quarter GDP growth at 0.3%
text:
Bank of France keeps forecasts for third-quarter GDP growth at 0.3%

Economic Indicators 28 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 02:51AM ET)

PARIS (Reuters) - The Bank of France maintained on Wednesday its earlier forecasts for third-quarter French economic growth at 0.3%, as the euro zone's second-biggest economy shows relative resilience amid signs of a recession in the broader region. The Bank of France said its measure of sentiment in the country's manufacturing industry fell to 96 points in September from 99 in August, while sentiment in the services sector dipped to 99 points in September from 100 in August.

Bank of France keeps forecasts for third-quarter GDP growth at 0.3%
description: Bank of France keeps forecasts for third-quarter GDP growth at 0.3%
